field.name: summary
field.value: Synchronize facility tests failed in release mode

field.name: description
field.value:
The current (trunk) version of Castle.Facility.Synchronize misses some tests in release mode because:
1) 'DOTNET2' compilation symbol is not defined in release mode.
2) System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(control.Handle != IntPtr.Zero) Is used to ensure that control's window handles are created. Calling the Handle property of a control will force the handle to be created (If the handle has not yet been created), but the method System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert() is only called in Debug mode...
